metadata.Description: Government agencies responsible for collecting and analyzing statistical data.

level 1.Description: National statistical offices collect and address energy access data to inform policy decisions and improve energy access.
National statistical offices employ energy analysts to analyze energy data and provide insights for sustainable energy planning.
National statistical offices collaborate with research institutions to conduct studies on energy consumption and trends.
National statistical offices support energy efficiency programs by providing data and insights for program development and evaluation.
National statistical offices administer energy surveys to gather data on energy consumption and usage patterns.
National statistical offices measure renewable energy capacity to track progress towards sustainable energy goals.
National statistical offices align their energy data collection and reporting with the Sustainable Development Goals.
National statistical offices are government agencies responsible for collecting and analyzing energy data.

level 2.Subject: energy data analytics
level 2.Description: Energy data analytics implements the Energy Efficiency Policy to optimize energy consumption and reduce waste.

level 2.Subject: energy data analytics
level 2.Description: Energy data analytics focuses on analyzing data related to renewable energy sources to identify trends and opportunities.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.
